mapper.select: SELECT rownum, board.boardseq, board.boardtitle, adopt.adoptstate, board.boarddate from board, adopt where board.boardseq = adopt.boardseq and board.userseq = #{userSeq} order by adopt.boardseq desc

select rownum, a.* from ( select adopt_req.adoptreqseq, board.boardseq, board.boardtitle, adopt_req.userseq, users.userid, users.username, adopt_req.adoptreqdate from users, board, adopt_req where board.boardseq = adopt_req.boardseq and users.userseq = adopt_req.userseq and board.userseq = #{userSeq} order by adopt_req.adoptreqseq) a order by rownum desc

select rownum, board.boardseq, board.userseq, board.boardtitle ,adopt.adoptimg, adopt.adoptkind, adopt.adoptstate, adopt_req.adoptreqdate, users.username, users.userid from adopt, board, users, adopt_req where board.boardseq = adopt.boardseq and board.boardseq = adopt_req.boardseq and board.userseq= users.userseq and adopt_req.userseq = #{userSeq}
select user_heart.*, adopt.adoptimg from user_heart, adopt where user_heart.boardseq = adopt.boardseq and user_heart.userseq = #{userSeq}
